(:action select ; Select a suitable resource and update selection status
  :parameters (?agent - person ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?resource))
  :effect (selected ?resource))

(:action create
  ; Create or assemble an item from given resources
  :parameters (?p - player ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?result - object)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item1) (or (inventory ?p ?item2) (found ?item2)) (selected ?item1))
  :effect (and (inventory ?p ?result) (not (inventory ?p ?item1))

(:action finish
  ; Complete a resource and update task status
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item))
  :effect (and (completed ?item) (not (inventory ?p ?item))
